maqras.text: 87|1|Ni dang zansong ni zhigao zhu de daming chaojue wanwu,
87|2|ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi ge wu yunchen.
87|3|Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao.
87|4|Ta shengchu mucao,
87|5|ranhou shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao.
87|6|Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji,
87|7|chufei an la suo yu wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing.
87|8|Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu,
87|9|gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua.
87|10|Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu;
87|11|boming de ren, jiang tuibi,
87|12|ta jiang ru yu dahuo,
87|13|ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo.
87|14|Chunjie zhe biding chenggong,
87|15|ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong.
87|16|Buran, nimen que xuanze jinshi de shenghuo;
87|17|qishi, houshi shi geng hao de, shi geng changjiu de.
87|18|Zhe que shi zai zai gu jingdian zhong de,
87|19|zai zai yi bo la xin he mu sa de jingdian zhong de.
88|1|Da zai de xiaoxi, que yi jianglin nile,
88|2|zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren shi gongjing de,
88|3|laodong de, xinku de,
88|4|tamen jiang ru liehuo,
88|5|jiang yin fei quan,
88|6|tamen meiyou shiwu, dan you jingji,
88|7|ji bu fei ren, you buneng chongji;
88|8|zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi xiangfu de,
88|9|shi wei qi laoji er yukuai de,
88|10|tamen jiang zai chonggao de leyuan zhong,
88|11|ting bu dao e yan,
88|12|limian you liu quan,
88|13|limian you gao ta,
88|14|you chenshezhe de bei zhan,
88|15|you pailiezhe de kaozhen,
88|16|you puzhankai de rong tan.
88|17|Nandao tamen bu guancha ma? Luotuo shi zenyang zaocheng de,
88|18|tian shi zenyang bei sheng gao de,
88|19|shanluan shi zenyang bei shuli qi de,
88|20|dadi shi zenyang bei zhan kai de.
88|21|Ni dang jiaohui, ni zhishi jiaohui (tamen de),
88|22|ni jue bushi jiancha tamen de,
88|23|dan shei zhuanshen li qu erqie bu xinjiao,
88|24|an la jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi shei.
88|25|Tamen biding zhi guiyu wo,
88|26|tamen de jihe, biding you wo fuze.
89|1|Shi yi liming,
89|2|yu shi ye,
89|3|yu oushu he jishu,
89|4|yu li qu de heiye,
89|5|duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong you yi zhong mengshi ma?
89|6|Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
89|7|you gao zhu de yi lai mu ren ma?
89|8|Xiang nayang de ren, zai bie de chengshi li hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo de——
89|9|zenyang chengzhi zai shangu li zao shi wei jia de sai mo de ren,
89|10|zenyang chengzhi you wuli de falao.
89|11|Zhe deng ren ceng zai guo zhong fangsi,
89|12|nai duo xing bu yi,
89|13|gu ni de zhu ba yi zhong xingfa, qingzhu zai tamen shenshang.
89|14|Ni de zhu, que shi jianshi de.
89|15|Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu kaoyan ta, gu youdai ta, erqie shi taguo anyi de shenghuo de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu youdai wole.”
89|16|Dang ta kaoyan ta, gu jieyue ta de jiyang de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu lingru wole.”
89|17|Jue buran! Dan nimen bu youdai gu'er,
89|18|nimen bu yi jipin xiang mianli,
89|19|nimen qintun yichan,
89|20|nimen ku'ai qiancai.
89|21|Jue buran! Dang dadi zhendong fu zhendong,
89|22|ni de zhu he zhenglie zhenglie de tianshi, tong qi lailin de shihou,
89|23|zai na ri, huo yu jiang bei na lai; zai na ri, ren jiang juewu, dan juewu yu ta you he biyi ne?
89|24|Ta jiang shuo:“Dan yuan wo zaishi de shihou ceng xingshanshi.”
89|25|Zai na ri, renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong xingfa chengzhi bieren;
89|26|renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong shufu shufu bieren.
89|27|Anding de linghun a!
89|28|Ni yingdang xiyue de, bei xiyue de guiyu ni de zhu.
89|29|Ni yingdang ru zai wo de zhong pu li;
89|30|ni yingdang ru zai wo de leyuan li.
